data.title: The Guardian Preps Review Product Focusing on Sustainability
data.meta_description: The Guardian’s new sustainability-focused review product debuts this summer.
data.text:
A job listing associated with the new, unnamed venture describes it as a means to guide Guardian readers toward sustainable options and help them use their products better and for longer.

A representative for The Guardian confirmed the new venture.

“This summer, The Guardian is launching a trusted recommendations section on our website, helping our readers to make more informed, more sustainable consumer choices,” said the spokesperson.
